Name: Biblical Quartet
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with dry cider.
Review: Four different apple products – three of them alcoholic – combined harmoniously in one cocktail, so obviously appley and just on the dry side of balanced.
History: Created in 2017 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England. According to Christianity, apples have a lot to answer for?
Nutrition: One serving of Biblical Quartet contains 182 calories
Garnish: Apple slice or dehydrated apple slice
